text: Hanchu rêngsukmunngei ku mua, a chunga ânsungpu ngei hah roijêk thei rangin rachamneina pêkin an oma. Jisua'n chongtak a phuong le Pathien chong an misîr sika an lutana omngei rathangei khom ku mu sa. Anni ngei han sarâng le arimil chubaimûk mak ngeia, sarâng sînthona khom an machalngeia mo, aninônchu an kutngeia mo khom dôn uol mak ngei. Anni ngei hah an hong ringa, male Khrista leh rêngngei anghan kum isâng roijêk rangin an om zoi.20:4; Dan 7:9,22
